campaign1.title: Padhega India, Tabhi Toh Badhega India!
campaign1.description: Let every child hold a book, not a broom. Support education for underprivileged children across India to build a stronger nation.
campaign1.testimonial: Your ₹300 helped Ravi from a Delhi slum get his school books. Now he dreams of becoming an engineer!

campaign2.title: Ek Thali Khushiyon Ki
campaign2.description: Feed one empty stomach, fill two hearts. Provide nutritious meals to hungry families and street children across India.
campaign2.testimonial: Thanks to 89 donors, street children in Mumbai get hot meals daily. No child sleeps hungry anymore.

campaign3.title: Beti Padhao, Sapne Sajao
campaign3.description: Educate a daughter, empower a nation. Support girl child education and break barriers to create tomorrow's leaders.
campaign3.testimonial: Your kindness helped Meera from rural Bihar attend school. She's now the first girl in her village to reach 10th grade!

campaign4.title: Ek Chhat – Ek Jeevan
campaign4.description: A roof today, a future tomorrow. Help homeless families get basic shelter and rebuild their lives with dignity.
campaign4.story: Home is where hope begins. Your ₹7000 can help build a small shelter for a homeless family.

campaign5.title: Jeevan Bachao, Muskaan Lautaao
campaign5.description: Help save a life. Bring back a smile. Support critical medical treatments for those who cannot afford healthcare.
campaign5.story: Every life saved is a family kept together. Your ₹2000 can contribute to life-saving medical treatment.

campaign6.title: Garmi ho ya Sardi, Madad ho har kism ki
campaign6.description: Blankets in winter, kindness all year. Provide warm clothing and essentials to the homeless during harsh weather.
campaign6.story: Warmth is basic humanity. Your ₹200 can provide a warm blanket to a homeless person this winter.

campaign7.title: Gaon-Gaon Paani, Har Haath Swachhta
campaign7.description: Clean water for every village, hygiene for every hand. Install water purification systems in water-scarce areas.
campaign7.story: Clean water is the foundation of healthy life. Your ₹500 can provide clean water access to a family for 6 months.

campaign8.title: Naye Hunar, Nayi Pehchaan
campaign8.description: New skills, new identity. Provide vocational training to unemployed youth to help them become self-reliant.
campaign8.story: Skills transform lives and break poverty cycles. Your ₹1500 can sponsor vocational training for one person.

campaign9.title: Maa Yamuna Ko Saaf Bhi Rakhna Hai, Zinda Bhi
campaign9.description: We must clean Yamuna, not bury her. Join river cleaning drives and environmental conservation efforts.
campaign9.story: Rivers are our lifelines. Your ₹300 can support river cleaning equipment and awareness campaigns.

campaign10.title: Buzurgo Ka Haq – Apnapan aur Samman
campaign10.description: Elders deserve love, care and dignity. Support elderly care programs and ensure they live with respect.
campaign10.story: Our elders built this nation. Your ₹800 can provide monthly care and medicine for one senior citizen.

campaign11.title: Khilti Muskaan, Acid ke Paar
campaign11.description: Smiles beyond scars. Support acid attack survivors with medical treatment, legal aid, and rehabilitation.
campaign11.story: Courage shines brighter than scars. Your ₹5000 can support reconstruction surgery and therapy for a survivor.

campaign12.title: Mazdoor Desh Ka Mazboot Haath
campaign12.description: Daily wagers build our nation—let's build their lives. Support migrant workers with emergency aid and skill development.
campaign12.story: They build our cities, let's build their futures. Your ₹500 can provide emergency aid kit for a worker family.

campaign13.title: Man Ki Baat, Sunne Wale Hain Hum
campaign13.description: Your mind matters. We're here to listen. Support mental health awareness and counseling services for those in need.
campaign13.story: Mental health is as important as physical health. Your ₹400 can sponsor one counseling session for someone in need.
